definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
lit. to ask a blind man the way (idiom)/fig. to seek advice from an incompetent

sentences.english: Mulan asked, her eyes bigger than ever.
sentences.chinese: 穆兰眼睁得大大地问道。

sentences.english: "Will Old Tang come today?" she asked.
"Is the book in artistic binding?" asked Joe.
"Well, what'll you give me for them?" asked the innkeeper's helper.
sentences.chinese: “给你这袋苹果，你给我什么呢？”酒馆伙计问道。

sentences.english: 'How do you know when to stop this?' she asked.
sentences.chinese: 她问道，你怎么知道什么时候可以停止治疗了呢？

sentences.english: "Do insides in the house all set out?"Chen Shi lightly continues to ask a access.
sentences.chinese: “屋子里都布置好了么？”沈氏淡淡的继续问道。

sentences.english: "Now, who will bake the bread, " asked the little red hen.
sentences.chinese: “现在，谁愿意烤面包，”红色小公鸡问道。

sentences.english: "Can Albert come out to play?" he asks.
sentences.chinese: “阿而波特能出来玩吗”他问道。

sentences.english: “What was it like to grow up with only a father?” Hanfeng asked.
sentences.chinese: 瀚峰问道，“从小长大只有父亲会是怎么样呢？”

sentences.english: The Zhang Fei mistrust ground asks a path, this because a while, the humans of environment all have been yet laughed.
sentences.chinese: 张斐疑惑地问道，这一下，周围的人都笑了起来了。

sentences.english: "How can I save you?" asked the princess.
sentences.chinese: “那我怎么才能救你呢？”公主问道。

sentences.english: "And how do you think you can do that?" Obi-Wan asked.
sentences.chinese: “那你想怎么帮忙？”欧比万质问道。

sentences.english: 'What are these pants?' one student finally asked.
sentences.chinese: 最终一名学生问道，这裤子是什么？

sentences.english: "What's in my hands?" asked the little boy.
sentences.chinese: “我手里是什么工具？”阿谁小男孩问道。

sentences.english: Otis asked, and turned to see three dizzy bullfrogs. 'Well, of course I did!
sentences.chinese: 奥蒂斯问道，并转身看着三只晕乎乎的牛蛙。
老师问道，宽容地微笑着。

definition: to ask (a question) in reply/to answer a question with a question/rhetorical question
variant of 怎麼了|怎么了[zen3 me5 le5]
to have heard what was said
in a low voice/(speak) in whispers
to ask a question, already knowing the answer
to not understand/to be puzzled by/indissoluble
like a smile yet not a smile (idiom)
